title: Ghislaine Maxwell's brother calls her 'real victim' in Epstein scandal; labels Virginia Giuffre ‘monster’
summary_full: Ghislaine Maxwell's brother, Ian, asserts she is the "real victim" in the Jeffrey Epstein scandal, calling accuser Virginia Giuffre a "monster." He claims Ghislaine was a "fall guy" and her trial was unfair, arguing her 20-year sentence is outrageous compared to others. Ian believes Ghislaine did nothing wrong and hopes for a presidential pardon.
